result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandon A. Loken was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brandon A. Loken is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Brandon A. Loken was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon A. Loken

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: of Sentencing Hearing 15CF147, 15CF177 State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon A. Loken
Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief

Defendant Brandon A. Loken in court with attorney Timothy Luke Angel.  Defendant Brandon A. Loken in custody.  Larry Eugene Nelson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State recites joint recommendation:  90 days jail, concurrent to any other cases/sentences.    Court verbally reviews charges/penalties with the defendant and review of joint recommendation.  Court accepts the joint recommendation and sentences the defendant accordingly.
